thread.section_title: Duminy Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, location
thread.title_full: Location, location, location - Review of Duminy Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LEN902
title: Location, location, location
text:
With its proximity to the Louvre and many other venues, this was a perfect place to stay. Since the street it's on is off the main avenue a block or so, we found it quiet and central for places we wanted to visit.
The rooms are typical of European small hotels, nothing fancy but very functional. In fact, we were pleased with the staff upon checking in and the ample breakfast bar. The breakfast room was in the basement which I was concerned about after looking at the pictures. However, it turned out to be delightful in fact charming.
In the end, a very memorable experience that I would repeat if we return to Paris in the future.
